headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Ocelot XA-21
content: Fresh from an underground lab that technically doesn’t exist, Ocelot’s XA-21 has now hit the streets of Los Santos, leaving a trail of shell-shocked and visibly aroused millionaires in its wake. If you thought hybrid tech was all about the environment, that special moment when you touch the XA-21’s accelerator and instantly soil yourself should change your mind.
